name: Air Fryer Portobello Pizzas for Two
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: Air fryer mushroom pizzas for two made easy in the air fryer. Feel free to use your favorite pizza toppings.
directions: Preheat an air fryer to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Rub 1 tablespoon olive oil over each mushroom
Sprinkle 1/2 teaspoon Italian seasoning inside each
Set mushrooms in the air fryer basket, cap sides up
Flip mushrooms over so that the cap is facedown in the basket
Divide pizza sauce between the 2 mushrooms
Cover with 2 tablespoons shredded mozzarella and 1 tablespoon sliced olives
Place 4 pepperoni slices on each pizza and cover with remaining mozzarella cheese
It is important to weigh the pepperoni down with cheese or the fan will blow them off the pizza
Air fry until cheese is melted and pepperoni is browned, about 2 minutes
